TopicBody:
One of the main features of eCommerce is to accept payment over the internet. There are many ways to support online payments. Most popular methods are Credit cards and Paypal.

We will set up your eCommerce system from scratch or implement it into your core business
Author: Viewcrossing

TopicBody:
A virtual tour is a simulation of an existing location, usually composed of a sequence of images. Virtual tour is currently widely adopted on various areas to simulate a sence or location in a way that users can view it, and control how they are going to view.

Our 360 Virtual tour system will help you bring in more customers

Smartphones now enjoy more and more market share

In addition to making phone calls, you can use a smartphone to perform these tasks,

  • Web surfing
  • Watching online movies
  • Check emails
  • Online games
  • Receive important news and notifications
  • Work on-the-go

We can help you do more of the things you love.

A Windows Store app (formerly known as Metro Style App) is a new type of app that is sold in the Windows Store and runs on Windows 8 devices. They run in full-screen by default and have a brand new look and feel.

They automatically work with a variety of input sources, including touch, pen, mouse, and keyboard. Instead of static icons, they use live tiles that can display notifications.
Description: Windows phone and Windows store apps
